game_description: Charge in and knock 'em out! Party up and hit the court for a three minute match of manic multiplayer dodgeball. You'll be racing to snag ammo, dodge incoming fire, and blast your opponents into the digital afterlife with a well timed orb of electric doom. Easy to pick up but challenging to master, Ultimate Glove Ball will test your timing, tactics, and tenacity. - Up to 3v3 Multiplayer - Quick 3 minute matches - 5 Ball types with unique abilities - Furious tactical gameplay - Spectator mode UGB is a showcase project for Meta Quest developers. Source code and assets can be found on GitHub at https://github.com/oculus-samples/Unity-UltimateGloveBall. - Oculus Social Platform Features (Invites, Group Launch, Group Presence, Blocking flow) - Meta Avatar integration - Oculus Audio Spatialization - Photon VOIP spatialized - Multiple Region support
